p: Past research has found a strong relationship between psychological distance and construal level in the context of general perceptions and cognitions ( Trope and Liberman, 2010; Soderberg et al., 2015): construal level shapes judgments of probability ( Todorov et al., 2007), temporal and spatial location ( Bar-Anan et al., 2007; Hansen and Trope, 2012), and social information ( Ledgerwood et al., 2010). In the next section, we review evidence on the link between construal level and psychological distance in the context of climate change.
